creator: Lavatech Limited
descriptionHtml:
The Hugh James app is a new mobile application which uses the latest technology to link our clients to their lawyer quickly and easily.

You’re in safe hands. At Hugh James, our Personal Injury experts will undertake your full legal needs. We will ensure you are kept up to date throughout the entire process.

Communicate with your lawyer, 24 hours a day by sending messages and photos whenever you like. Your lawyer can also send messages to you which will be kept neatly within the app, recording everything permanently.

Features:
• Provides regular updates to your phone or tablet whilst on the go
• View and sign forms or documents, returning them securely to you
• A mobile virtual file of all messages, letters and documents
• Ability to track case against a visual tracking tool
• Send messages and photos direct to your Lawyers inbox (without needing to provide a reference or even a name)
• Convenience by allowing instant mobile access 24/7
descriptionShort: Using the latest technology to link clients to their lawyer quickly and easily.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Identity check feature
- Minor gub fixes
